content.en: Quantum Cryptography: Researchers in the field of cryptography are evaluating the impact of algorithms, such as Shor's algorithm and quantum cryptography, on the security of public-key cryptography. They are exploring the power of quantum computation to withstand quantum adversaries and developing post-quantum cryptosystems that can resist quantum computing-based attacks. Additionally, they are investigating the integration of quantum key distribution with conventional cryptography algorithms to enhance security in data transmission.
content.da: Kvantekryptografi: Forskere inden for kryptografi vurderer virkningen af algoritmer, såsom Shor's algoritme og kvantekryptografi, på sikkerheden af offentlige nøglekryptografisystemer. De udforsker kraften i kvanteberegning til at modstå kvanteangribere og udvikler post-kvante kryptosystemer, der kan modstå angreb baseret på kvantecomputing. Derudover undersøger de integrationen af kvante nøglefordeling med konventionelle kryptografialgoritmer for at forbedre sikkerheden i datatransmission.
